body:
@ma-xiao-guang-64 SELECT * FROM order
        WHERE `business_id` = ?
            AND ( `member_discount` = 1
                OR `order_discount` = 1
                OR `order_derate` = 1
                OR `order_derate_zero` = 1
                OR `item_member_discount` = 1
                OR `order_promotion` = 1
                OR `coupon_promotion` = 1
                OR `order_bargain` = 1
                OR `timed_item_discount` = 1
                OR `x_discount` = 1 )
I deleted some unrelated fields, where business_id is shardingKey, and it repeats ten times

@weiduan 
ok，repeats ten times is correct.
in sharding parser this sql will change to
WHERE business_id = ? AND member_discount = 1
OR business_id = ? AND order_discount = 1
OR business_id = ? AND order_derate = 1
OR business_id = ? AND order_derate_zero = 1
OR business_id = ? AND item_member_discount = 1
OR business_id = ? AND order_promotion = 1
OR business_id = ? AND coupon_promotion = 1
OR business_id = ? AND order_bargain = 1
OR business_id = ? AND timed_item_discount = 1
OR business_id = ? AND x_discount = 1 )
why you look shardingConditions size is 10!
in doSharding work the ten shardingConditions will to doSharding

英文捉急以下为中文
sql解析阶段
将OR用类似乘法分配律的方法解析
所以会出现10个OR条件也就是10个sharidngConditions

路由阶段
分别对10个OR条件路由然后将路由结果去并集以上看到虽然doSharding执行了10次但是最终执行sql的时候只会去business_id = ?的分片去执行

关于解析后的Conditions
采用的是List<List<Condition>>的结构
List<Condition>代表的是执行了类似乘法分配律的解析之后的business_id = ? AND member_discount = 1其中已经不包含了OR
多个List<Condition>组成了List<List<Condition>>每个List<List<Condition>>之间的关系是OR

@ma-xiao-guang-64 Oh,i see.The routing result was indeed correct. Is it possible to optimize the repeating sharidngConditions to one in the future? After all, doSharding() will be executed too many times.Thank you for your answer!
@weiduan it is so hard, we possible merge it in future

can we close this issue?

When the DataSourceName configured  is different with the actual database name, the statement 'SHOW COLUMNS FROM tbl_name [FROM db_name] ' will get error. This is because the sharding SQLBuilder can not can the actual database name to replace the defualt database name.

So, this enhancement will analyze JDBC Url to get the actual database name to replace the  defualt database name.

Hi, @zhangfeibiao So far, I haven't received your friend request yet, so i can not get detail about your issue. But, i tried to reappear your problem. 

That is, there are two tables t1 and t2, without sharding rule but existed in the same default datasource, and i use the SQL of select * from t1 left join t2 on t1.order_id = t2.order_id to do query. The result is the expected one.

The difference between yours and mine is the vesion of Sharding-JDBC. Also i read the related code of the Version 1.5.3, if my case is same with yours, i think Sharding-JDBC of Ver.1.5.3 will cause this problem, but Ver 3.0.0.M1 will not.

So i suggest you to use Sharding-JDBC with latest version. Thanks a lot, if any problem, please let me know.
